name: sim-city
description: Strong guards separate you from the other parts of your poor city. Build your part well and you might be able to break through to the other players. There's also a neutral part in the middle of the city with twice more towns and all Forts built. Recommended difficulty: 160%. Up to 8 players. Size XL. Inspired by the Pyda XL template.
author: Warzyw647
